data.description: Based on CC0-licensed style by seanysean.

data.name: Minimal Transparent Whatsapp ☺
data.description: A stripped down, minimal dark theme for Whatsapp, completely rewritten and actively updating. Fully configurable. For inputs with (RGBA) label, you can choose a color here then paste on them. If you don't want the doodles, set Doodles Opacity to 0 and update. White Doodles allows inverted doodles color. I saw this idea on Vednoc theme and it was great. Currently working on a UserCSS version, will upload when agenda allows. Use it with Stylus for Chrome, Firefox, Opera or Edge. Try Transparent Telegram theme.
